programme.title: Khumo, Lehuma Le Kgosi: War

programme.title: Tooth And Nails
programme.desc: A failed kwaito star tries to relaunch his career. However, he falls into the hands of a villainous loan shark and finds himself running for his life.

programme.title: Enkuba
programme.desc: Three brothers are confused and scared after the death of their parents when unusual things start to happen in their house causing superstition and fear.

programme.title: Love Heist
programme.desc: Tsholo falls in love with one of the men shes trying to con, she has to decide whether to follow her heart or fulfill her duty.

programme.title: Ego Check
programme.desc: A graduate unknowingly finds herself in a fight with the boss daughter on her first day as an intern. She is tasked with reforming the notorious daughter within two weeks.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: A Zimbabwean national takes a job as a watchman, to watch over The Wall, a famous landmark that is cherished by the community.

programme.title: The Tokoloshe

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Problems Are...

programme.title: Motorway
programme.desc: On the streets of Hong Kong, an arrogant rookie cop and his veteran partner confront a legendary getaway driver, using their cars as weapons in a high stakes showdown.

programme.title: Full Alert
programme.desc: Inspector Pao wants to stop a huge money heist led by an escaped convict Mak Kwan, but ends up engaging in a cat-and-mouse game with him.

programme.title: The Dead And The Deadly
programme.desc: A murderous plot to claim the fortune of a wealthy family is thwarted when the spirit of the victim enters the body of a young sorcerer to take revenge.

programme.title: Kungfu Cyborg: Metallic Attraction
programme.desc: An advanced cyborg cop is created as a crime fighter for the villagers in 2046. It can overcome most challenges except for love and battling a rogue cyborg.

programme.title: 3AM The Office
programme.desc: A newcomer offends the ghosts in his office on his first day at work and experiences spooky encounters during night shifts, making him reflect on his behaviour.

programme.title: Zu: Warriors From Magic Mountain
programme.desc: A young warrior teams up with his master and a band of heroes to find two celestial swords, so as to fight the Blood Demon seeking to wreak havoc upon the world.

programme.title: The Sniper
programme.desc: A police sniper teams up with a hot-headed rookie to take down his former friend and teammate who is exacting revenge on the police.

programme.title: The Best of Best
programme.desc: Jie has joined SDU and vows to uphold law and justice. As Jie falls in love with the daughter of a triad boss who killed his father, he is torn between love and family...

programme.title: Iceman Cometh
programme.desc: While Fang, a Ming royal guard, pursues an evil rapist, they are accidentally frozen. Thawed out to modern-day Hong Kong, Fang continues his pursuit to uphold justice.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover agent helps the police to solve mysterious cases, making him a rising star. However, his impulsive personality drags him into endless troubles.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, three disciples undergo rigorous training to avenge the death of the Dragon Gate Master by defeating the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict released from jail finds out that his wife has died and his daughter has leukemia. To encourage his daughter, he returns to the ring.

programme.title: The Postman Fights Back
programme.desc: When postman Ma and three other mismatched allies deliver a secret cargo to the rebel leader, Ma finds himself on a patriotic quest to save the country and himself.

programme.title: Enter The Girl Dragon
programme.desc: Pooja, a big fan of Bruce Lee, practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight back to save him.

programme.title: The Hidden Enforcers
programme.desc: A retired police officer trains four assassins to punish wrongdoers who escaped from conviction. However, his good intention turns sour when the assassins kill the cops.

programme.title: Butterfly Lovers
programme.desc: Loosely based on the Butterfly Lovers legend, this is the tragic love story between Zhu Yan Zhi and her martial arts senior, Liang Zhong Shan, in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Most Wanted
programme.desc: A botched police raid leads to a suspected betrayal of an undercover cop. As he is put on the most wanted list by both police and the triad, can he prove his innocence?

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily. A talented virtual car racing champion joins them to regain its glory.

programme.title: Rosa
programme.desc: Two bumbling cops must retrieve a roll of film containing the criminal evidence against a drug cartel from the informants girlfriend, Rosa, to track down the gangsters.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a housewife living with her husband and daughter. When a stranger uses her dark history to blackmail her, Mrs K is forced to face an old enemy to save her family.

programme.title: Wild Search
programme.desc: In a gun trafficking raid, a police officer finds the little girl who witnessed her mothers murder by the ruthless gunrunners, and must protect her from being killed.

programme.title: The Iron Fisted Monk
programme.desc: After learning kung fu from Shaolin, Husker teams up with the Iron Fisted Monk to fight against the Manchus who have killed villagers and raped women.

programme.title: The Avenging Fist
programme.desc: A young man uses martial arts skill founded by his father, and the Power Glove, a tool that unleashes mind power, to battle rebels intending to dominate the world.

programme.title: Helios
programme.desc: When the notorious criminal, Helios steals a powerful weapon from South Korea and attempts to sell it in Hong Kong, the police forces of these two lands must join hands.

programme.title: The Heroic Trio
programme.desc: Newborn babies destined to be emperors are kidnapped by the Evil Master. The police are powerless, so the city must be saved by three women with superb fighting skills.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong in 1917. When the whole school is held hostage during the day of an English speech competition, Ip Man decides to step up...

programme.title: 3AM The Driver
programme.desc: A taxi driver judges people and sets out to help victims in his own way. When trying to help the woman he likes, he turns into a cold-blooded serial killer instead.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: At the dawn of 1997, three notorious Hong Kong thieves coincidentally meet in a restaurant, sparking rumours of a huge heist before the Handover unbeknownst to them.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Madam Fong leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the HK Deputy Commissioner of Police.

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of police officers uncovers their seniors involvement in an illegal plot after a drug operation raid. They vow to bring them to justice and root out corruption.

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: While con man Bo and femme fatale Li swindle their way across China, Li suddenly decides to leave Bo. However, their encounter with Fu Gen changes their fate forever.

programme.title: Eclats De Vie
programme.desc: La relation amoureuse entre une jeune artiste et lheritier dune famille fortunee, qui doit lutter pour imposer ses choix face ses proches, reveille de lourds.

programme.title: Passions Troubles
programme.desc: A la mort mysterieuse dun homme daffaires puissant, lepouse de lun de ses employes, son amie de frache date et son amant sont suspectes.

programme.title: Le Choix De Juana

programme.title: Bangkok Dog
programme.desc: American agent Andrew Kang puts his life on the line in an undercover mission to take down the crime lord behind a people-trafficking operation.

programme.title: What Happens In Miami
programme.desc: What should be a fun spring break quickly becomes a nightmare for a group of teens when they end up in the frame for a friends disappearance.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds
programme.desc: In an updated version of the HG Wells classic, the invasion of Earth by indomitable alien tripods is seen through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Filly Brown
programme.desc: A street poet gets a shot at fame after being approached by a major label. However, accepting the deal means she must make some tough compromises.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the best action movies. In each episode, youll get all the secrets straight from your favourite action heroes.

programme.title: Like Mike 2: Street Ball
programme.desc: Another young boy with dreams of becoming the king of concrete finds an old pair of Michael Jordans sneakers.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking from a clan of fierce dragon-slayers changes the lives of everyone around him when he decides to befriend an injured dragon.

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: The animal buddies team up to save Mr Weenie, who has been dog-napped by an evil poodle who wants to re-domesticate him.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The furry foursome and their penguin pals crash-land in Africa, where a family reunion awaits for one of them, as well as a voyage of discovery.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from a reptilian foe.

programme.title: Nicky Deuce
programme.desc: A young man who has never left the suburbs ends up embracing his inner wise guy after hes sent to spend the summer with dodgy Brooklyn relatives.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: When a deranged criminal destroys the British agencys secret headquarters, unexpected support for the dapper spy group emerges from across the Pond.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami detectives have five days to track down $100 million of stolen heroin or else Internal Affairs will shut down their division.
